mapper.select: select * from product where title=#{title} and content=#{content}

select pro.id,pst.productId,pro.title,pro.thumb,pro.price,pro.disc,pro.ad,pro.discounted,pro.content,pro.categoryId,pro.bgImg,pst.sale,pst.newly,pst.best,ca.parentTypeId from product pro inner join product_status pst inner join category ca on pro.id = pst.productId and ca.parentTypeId = pro.categoryId
